name: Art Palace Suites & Spa
question: Do you offer airport shuttle service?
response: Airport shuttle can be arranged upon request

name: Art Palace Suites & Spa
question: Can I arrange for a private transfer?
response: We are pleased to inform you that we collaborate with a private chauffeur company that provides shuttles from/to Casablanca Mohammed V airport to/from our hotel for our guests at a rate of 400 MAD per trip. This company has Mercedes-Benz Vito vehicles that can accommodate up to 5 people with luggage. The price of the airport transfer will be added to your invoice and payable upon check out. Please confirm that this is convenient for you, send us your flight information, and we will gladly arrange the airport shuttle for your arrival.

name: Art Palace Suites & Spa
question: Is parking available at the hotel, and if so, is there a fee?
response: We are pleased to inform you that our establishment has a private parking lot in the immediate vicinity and a valet service. We are also pleased to inform you that there is availability and you do not need to reserve your parking space.

name: Art Palace Suites & Spa
question: What are the conditions for baby cots and extra beds?
response:
Cots: Children up to and including 6 years old stay for free when using an available cot.
Extra beds Children up to and including 11 years old stay for free when using an available extra bed. Children from 12 years old to 17 years old stay for EUR 30.00 per person per night when using an available extra bed.
Adults stay for EUR 50.00 per person per night when using an available extra bed
